attributes.action: Lobby the Console manufacturers to reduce the price of hardware to be more in line with the US prices
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: when a new console is released later over here we find the price in the US is normally about half the cost of the same (in the case of the PS3 inferrior) for exactley the same product. how cany they expect us to carry on paying over inflated prices in the European Markets when the US seem to be getting price consessions.
